remarks: Double existential uniqueness.  This theorem shows a condition under which a "naive" definition matches the correct one.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Dec-2001.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 11-Nov-2019.)
statement: 2eu1 $p |- ( A. x E* y ph -> ( E! x E! y ph <-> ( E! x E. y ph /\ E! y E. x ph ) ) ) $.
